name: Benjamin Harris
description: I am an easy going man,loving,caring,kind,humble, patient and like to help others however I can. I think friendship, love and partnership are important qualities in a family. I think a close family should be an ongoing lifetime commitment, and through this commitment it can produce some of life’s greatest rewards.I don’t want to have any regrets when I get old. I value my family and loved ones above all else.I enjoy doing a variety of different things and think it is also good to have an open mind about trying new things. Swimming, water skiing, river rafting, going to the ocean, and hiking in the mountains are some of my favorite summer activities.I’m looking for that special woman, who is ready to commit to a serious and meaningful relationship. She does not have to be the most gorgeous woman, nevertheless, she must have beauty inside. Seriously, I want a monogamous relationship with a woman I can be very comfortable with. I want to have fun, but not with everyone, with someone special. I want to be an enhancement to her life, NOT a substitution for things she did prior to meeting me.
